page.title: 12Recreation 2
page.content:
{ Scalby}Tennis and{Scalby}and{Newby Bowling Clubs have 4 gravel courts and 2 flat greens, open to the public, on a shared 4-acre site. The clubs have a shared, newly-built, private pavilion.
There are 3 public crown bowling greens, Council-owned and maintained, in{Alexandra gardens}behind the{Floral {Hall.} Competitive games are also played here.
The{North Cliff}Golf Club has an extensive 18-hole course and licensed club house for members only.
{ Scarborough}Swimming Pool is Council-owned and open throughout the year. It is indoor and has two pools, one for learners.
